sanskrit_verse:
द्विकं त्रिकं चतुष्कं च पञ्चकं च शतं समम् ।
मासस्य वृद्धिं गृह्णीयाद्वर्णानामनुपूर्वशः ॥ ८.१४२॥
transliteration:
dvikaṁ trikaṁ catuṣkaṁ ca pañcakaṁ ca śataṁ samam |
māsasya vṛddhiṁ gṛhṇīyād varṇānām anupūrvaśaḥ || 8.142 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: In accordance with the sequential order of varṇas, one shall receive increases of two, three, four, five, and up to hundredfold in a month.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is derived from sequential cosmic order (anupūrvaśaḥ)
Capacity-based responsibility escalates with alignment to varṇic structure
Restoration logic operates through proportional energetic return
executable_legal_axioms: IF entity aligns with sequential varṇic duty THEN increment resource allocation by prescribed numeric scale monthly
IF consciousness integrity matches varṇic rhythm THEN activate proportional abundance protocol
IF societal role reflects dharma-resonance THEN enable exponential return mechanism within lunar cycle
IF no punitive residue detected THEN allow compound growth per varṇic order
supreme_court_application: At the Supreme Court level, this principle governs resource adjudication based on alignment with sequential varṇic function. Responsibility thresholds are determined not by transgression but by vibrational congruence with constitutional dharma. The court must assess not fault but functional harmony when assigning economic or energetic returns.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that causality flows from alignment, not violation. As action manifests sequentially in accordance with varṇic rhythm, so too does reward unfold naturally. There is no imposition; only recognition of inherent consequence. This reflects anupūrvaśaḥ — the law of ordered unfolding. Responsibility is assumed through resonance, not coercion.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Activate Completion Process: Align individual action stream with sequential varṇic flow
Initiate Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Confirm vibrational match between conduct and cosmic order
Deploy Capacity Restoration Sequence: Reinforce energetic infrastructure supporting lawful expansion
Execute Integrity Reintegration Cycle: Stabilize recipient field for receiving aligned abundance
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law is declared. Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness is the supreme adjudicator. All abundance flows in alignment with varṇic sequence.
